dmca.title: UK Individual Complains of Defamation in Google Groups
dmca.body:
Dear [Private]

Thank you for your e-mail of 12 May 2005 confirming that the pages I complained of in my letter of 5 May 2005 have now been removed from Google.co.uk. I attach a Schedule of further of sites which contain offensive material which we request be removed.

At the bottom of the schedule is a message that was displayed at the end of the search stating that related material is not displayed. Therefore I also request the removal of all material related to these defamatory sites. It is clear that due to the volume of offensive material, and the grave nature of the offences caused to my client, it is reasonable for you to carry out this request.

In your e-mail of 12 May 2005 you also requested Message IDs for the messages I asked be removed from the Google
